verses.verse: How <S%H4100><s%> hast thou helped <S%H5826><s%> him that is without <S%H3808><s%> power? <S%H3581><s%> how savest <S%H3467><s%> thou the arm <S%H2220><s%> that hath no <S%H3808><s%> strength? <S%H5797><s%>

How <S%H4100><s%> hast thou counseled <S%H3289><s%> him that hath no <S%H3808><s%> wisdom? <S%H2451><s%> and how hast thou plentifully <S%H7230><s%> declared <S%H3045><s%> the thing <S%H8454><s%> as it is?
To <S%H854><s%> whom <S%H4310><s%> hast thou uttered <S%H5046><s%> words? <S%H4405><s%> and whose <S%H4310><s%> spirit <S%H5397><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> thee?
Dead <S%H7496><s%> things are formed <S%H2342><s%> from under <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8478><s%> the waters, <S%H4325><s%> and the inhabitants <S%H7931><s%> thereof.
Hell <S%H7585><s%> is naked <S%H6174><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> him, and destruction <S%H11><s%> hath no <S%H369><s%> covering. <S%H3682><s%>
He stretcheth out <S%H5186><s%> the north <S%H6828><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the empty place, <S%H8414><s%> and hangeth <S%H8518><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> nothing. <S%H1099><s%>
He bindeth up <S%H6887><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> in his thick clouds; <S%H5645><s%> and the cloud <S%H6051><s%> is not rent <S%H1234><s%> <S%H3808><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> them.
He holdeth back <S%H270><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of his throne, <S%H3678><s%> and spreadeth <S%H6576><s%> his cloud <S%H6051><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it.

He hath compassed <S%H2328><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the waters <S%H6440><s%> <S%H4325><s%> with bounds, <S%H2706><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the day <S%H216><s%> and night <S%H2822><s%> come to an end. <S%H8503><s%>
The pillars <S%H5982><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> tremble <S%H7322><s%> and are astonished <S%H8539><s%> at his reproof. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1606><s%>
He divideth <S%H7280><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> with his power, <S%H3581><s%> and by his understanding <S%H8394><s%> he smiteth through <S%H4272><s%> the proud. <S%H7293><s%>
By his spirit <S%H7307><s%> he hath garnished <S%H8235><s%> the heavens; <S%H8064><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> hath formed <S%H2490><s%> the crooked <S%H1281><s%> serpent. <S%H5175><s%>

Lo, <S%H2005><s%> these <S%H428><s%> are parts <S%H7098><s%> of his ways: <S%H1870><s%> but how <S%H4100><s%> little <S%H8102><s%> a portion <S%H1697><s%> is heard <S%H8085><s%> of him? but the thunder <S%H7482><s%> of his power <S%H1369><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> can understand? <S%H995><s%>
